JobTitle: Sr. Advisor, Complexity Analytics, Marketing Ops
JobFullDesc: Marketing Operations Senior AdvisorBefore we can drive human progress with our game-changing products we must first attract human attention. Marketing Operations teams are integral to shaping our approach. They work in close partnership with teams that specialize in segment marketing, global operations, product management, customer relationship marketing and finance. In collaboration, they build both demand plans for whole product families and specific marketing plans for particular products or segments. Outlining approaches as well as specific activities, they are key to establishing, enhancing and distinguishing Dell Technologies product placement within a competitive global market. It’s all about standing out.Join us as a Marketing Operations Senior Advisor on our Marketing team in Central Texas to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.What you’ll achieveAs Marketing Operations Sr. Advisor, you will be one of an elite group of analysts supporting Client Product Group’s complexity management effort. You will be squarely focused on helping Dell achieve industry-leading product, supply chain and services simplicity, while investing in the right variety of commodities to win in the marketplace. Under the guidance of the Ops Sr. Consultant, you would support analytical projects which help simplify product offerings and reduce costs associated with supply chain complexity. In addition to analytics, the Marketing Operations Sr. Advisor is also responsible for influencing a broad spectrum of functions and helping support and shape world-class complexity governance processes and tools.You will:Support development of approved commodity limits (ACL) for commodities managed under Complexity Management processHelp manage changes to the ACL for assigned commodities.Assess impact of product change requests to ACL and provide Marketing Operations point of view and recommendation based on cost benefit analysis.Support with data pull and analysis for commodity catalog creation, design to leverage and other initiativesSupport implementation and evolution of necessary tools and infrastructure to improve team efficacy and business planningTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life.
